content: सर्गः [सृज्-घञ्] {@--1@} Relinquishment, abandonment. {@--2@} Creation; अस्याः सर्गविधौ प्रजापतिरभूच्चंद्रो नु कांतिप्रदः <ls>V. 1. 8.</ls> {@--3@} The creation of the world; <ls>Ku. 2. 6</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 27.</ls> {@--4@} Nature, the universe. {@--5@} Natural property, nature. {@--6@} Determination, resolve; गृहाण शस्त्रं यदि सर्ग एष ते <ls>R. 3. 51</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 42</ls>; <ls>Śi. 19. 38.</ls> {@--7@} Assent, agreement. {@--8@} A section, chapter, canto (as of a poem). {@--9@} Rush, onset, advance (of troops). {@--10@} Voiding of excrement. {@--11@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--12@} Fainting, swoon (मोह). {@--13@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A horse.
